completed_projects.completion_summary: Transformed .claude/ system from Lean 4 theorem proving to stock Neovim configuration. Created 17 Neovim context files, 2 specialized agents, 2 skills, and neovim-lua rule.
Updated specs/README.md to document the directory lifecycle, state management files, and archival workflow.
Systematically updated .claude/ documentation to remove 587+ Lean references across 88 files.
Completed Lean-to-Neovim transition in .claude/context/ by updating 20+ files.
Added agents/ directory support to the <leader>ac picker.
Added [Root Files] section to <leader>ac picker displaying .gitignore, README.md, CLAUDE.md, and settings.local.json.
Migrated git repository from ~/.config/ to ~/.config/nvim/ using git-filter-repo, preserving 2,401 commits.
Fixed .claude/specs/ path references in nvim/.claude/ directory. Only 2 files had incorrect references.

completed_projects.abandoned_reason: No longer needed - specs/ already at project root
No longer needed - duplicate data issue resolved during task migration

completed_projects.completion_summary: Created migrate-directory-padding.sh script for renaming task directories to 3-digit padded format. Verified all 19 existing directories already compliant. No migrations required.
Updated 20+ documentation files to use 3-digit padded directory format ({NNN}_{SLUG}) instead of unpadded ({N}_{SLUG}). Updated user guides, context patterns, commands, and architecture docs.
Verified all 9 agent files already use {NNN}_{SLUG} format for task directories. No changes were required as the agents were already compliant with the padded directory standard.

Updated 8 skill files (research, planner, implementer, neovim-implementation, latex-implementation, typst-implementation, git-workflow) to use {NNN}_{SLUG} format in path templates for directory numbers.

Updated all workflow commands (/research, /plan, /implement, /revise, /todo) to use 3-digit padded directory numbers. Skills construct paths with printf %03d, agents document {NNN}_{SLUG} pattern, commands maintain backward compatibility.
Updated /task command with 3-digit zero-padded directory naming. All modes (Create, Recover, Review, Abandon) now use padded format and handle legacy unpadded directories for backward compatibility.

Defined 3-digit zero-padded directory numbering standard in artifact-formats.md, state-management.md, and CLAUDE.md. All path templates now use {NNN}_{SLUG} pattern with printf guidance for implementation.
